name: hardwood

[ C or U ] strong, heavy wood or the tree it comes from: Cherry and mahogany are two of the more popular hardwoods for building furniture. Compare
softwood
[ S ] something made of strong, heavy wood, especially the floor on which a game such as basketball or bowling is played: the hardwood He had built a long, impressive career as one of the most dynamic players on the hardwood. Despite a summer spent pounding the hardwood at the bowling alley, I am not yet a great kegler.
